alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and northeastern Duval Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Caroline, or near Arlington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Mayport, Talbot Island, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.
